name.description: must be a string and is required

gender.description: must be a string and is not required

year.description: must be an integer in [ 2017, 3017 ] and is required

major.description: can only be one of the enum values and is required

gpa.description: must be a double and is required

address.city.description: must be a string and is required

address.street.description: must be a string and is required
